title: How to Get Stone in Minecraft

steps.title: Create a furnace by filling every space in a crafting table with cobblestone, except the middle.
steps.content: Create a furnace by filling every space in a crafting table with cobblestone, except the middle.

steps.title: Put your smelting source in the bottom space in your furnace and put cobblestone in the top.
steps.content: Put your smelting source in the bottom space in your furnace and put cobblestone in the top.

steps.title: Enchant your pickaxe with silk touch.
steps.content: Enchant your pickaxe with silk touch.

steps.title: Mine a block of stone with this pickaxe.
steps.content: Mine a block of stone with this pickaxe.

steps.title: Instead of cobblestone, you will get stone!
steps.content: Instead of cobblestone, you will get stone!

steps.title: Make sure cheats are enabled.
steps.content: Make sure cheats are enabled. If not, turn them on

steps.title: Open the chat.
steps.content: Open the chat. The standard button for this action is t .

steps.title: Type the following cheat:
steps.content: Type the following cheat: /give <player> minecraft:stone [amount] . Replace <player> with your username and [amount] with how many stone blocks you want.
